attributes.action: cancel the idiotic waste of tax payers money being spent to train 'Smoke Police'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yet again this government ceases to amaze me, another complete and utter waste of tax payers money which could be put a more deserving use.  £30 million so far to train these people, where will it all end?  How many trained nurses would that get?, or how many more police on the streets?  I am afraid that if this is New Labour at its best, then thank goodness there is a general election in the near future.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
